text: The Doctor's Dilemma is a 1958 British drama movie directed by Anthony Asquith and was based on the 1906 play of the same name by George Bernard Shaw. It stars Leslie Caron, Dirk Bograde, Robert Morley, Alastair Sim, Felix Aylmer, Michael Gwynn, Alec McCowen, Colin Gordon and was distributed by Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * Category:1958 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Anthony Asquith
title: The Doctor's Dilemma (movie)
